def_cn: 紧张不安;大惊小怪;忙乱
def_en: Fuss is anxious or excited behaviour which serves no useful purpose.

def_cn: 紧张不安;大惊小怪;瞎忙活
def_en: If you fuss, you worry or behave in a nervous, anxious way about unimportant matters or rush around doing unnecessary things.
If you fuss over someone, you pay them a lot of attention and do things to make them happy or comfortable.

def_cn: 引起骚动;大吵大闹;大发牢骚
def_en: If you make a fuss or kick up a fuss about something, you become angry or excited about it and complain.

def_cn: 对…关爱备至;对…过分体贴
def_en: If you make a fuss of someone, you pay them a lot of attention and do things to make them happy or comfortable.
